name: leaguelastmatches
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool esportapi.
Tool description: ESportApi offers eSports results for League of Legends, Dota 2, Counter-Strike providing also eSports standings and tournament live scores.
For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/allsportsapi2/
API description: Get the last matches for a specific E-Sports league by providing the tournament ID, season ID, and page number.

page.description: The zero-based page number for pagination.

seasonid.description: The season ID for which you want to retrieve the league's last matches.

tournamentid.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the league's last matches.
